mapper.select: select `Contact_ID`,`Contact_Name`,`Contact_Sex`,`Contact_Salutation`,`BirthDay`,`Contact_Title`, `Contact_Responsibility`,`Contact_Role`,a.`Customer_ID`,`Contact_Dept`,`Contact_Job`,`Contact_Marital_Status`, `Contact_Age`,`Contact_Family_Status`,`Contact_Graduate_Institutions`,`Contact_Skill`, `Contact_Years_Working`,`Contact_Experience`,`Contact_Previous_Company`, `Contact_Superiors`,`Contact_Status`,`Contact_Introduction`,`Contact_Owner`, `Contact_Sales`,`Contact_Phone_Number`,`Contact_Mailbox`,`Contact_Work_Phone_Number`, `Contact_Family_Phone_Number`,`Contact_Fax`,`Contact_Family_Address`,`Contact_Weixin`, `Contact_QQ`,`Contact_Special_Day_Category`,`Contact_Special_Day`,`Contact_Interest`, `Contact_Remarks`,`Contact_Operator`,`Contact_Operate_Time`, b.Customer_Province,b.Customer_City,b.Customer_County from sales_customer_contact a left join sales_company_customer b on a.Customer_ID=b.Customer_ID where Contact_ID = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from sales_customer_contact where Contact_ID in
#{contactId}
